entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add CI and release build for linux-armel #72562
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Native.Android-static is braking JNI libs compiled with NativeAOT. #72556
    Future
  • System.Net.Mail in .net 6 is almost 5 times slower compared to .net 4.7.2 #72555
  • [API Proposal]: Add leaveOpen concept to PartitionedRateLimiter.TranslateKey #72551
  • `string.StartsWith` with `OrdinalIgnoreCase` appears to become `Equals` after optimization #72550
    7.0.0
  • Bad test input in `UpgradeToRegexGeneratorAnalyzerTests` #72544
    Future
  • In Mono runtime, `Type.GetTypeCode` returns improper value for an enum nested in a generic class #72543
  • Developers stuck with .NET 5 need a fix for #43675 in .NET 5 #72540
  • system.io.compression.tests.zipfile_extract.extracttodirectoryunicode #72537
  • Test failure: [error] The job running on agent NetCore1ESPool-Public 31 ran longer than the maximum time of 270 minutes #72531
    7.0.0
  • ConcurrentBidirectionalReadsWrites_Success test hangs for named pipes created in certain ways #72526
    Future
  • JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_71592 failing #72519
  • Blazor hosted app gets compile warnings of call unavailable in the browser but no warning of calls that may not be supported in a docker container #72513
  • [API Proposal]: Add property bag to QuicConnection #72511
  • Redundant similar Relop checks can be eliminated #72509
    Future
  • Vector256.Create() randomly throws PlatformNotSupportedException #72506
    7.0.0
  • The same asp.net core application runs on windows and linux, the workspace memory usage is doubled #72557

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: `Marshal.GetPInvokeErrorMessage()` overload for localization #72546
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] A type initializer throws an exception when creating a delegate via reflection #72547
  • Remove Microsoft.NETCore.DotNetHost NuGet packages #35244
    7.0.0
  • Regex Capture gives ArgumentOutOfRangeException (regression) and incorrect index (not regression) in lazy quantifier around zero lower bound quantifier that does not match #62094
    7.0.0
  • VS can't debug a trimmed win-x64 app #53448
    7.0.0
  • `Debug.Fail` in `UpgradeToRegexGeneratorCodeFixer` is reachable #72085
    7.0.0
  • Align Mono and coreclr behavior for thiscall without arguments #72438
  • Investigate OutOfMemory Exception happening woth Regex.Match for some patterns in the interpreted engine. #63385
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Linux dwarf info is severely malformed #70125
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.IO #72406
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] The Finalize method is not preserved via reflection #72494
  • Use instance methods for SerializeHandler in source gen #61448
    Future
  • [wasm][eat] Failing test because of "Use of ResourceManager for custom types is disabled" #51833
    Future
  • [Breaking change]: Calls to BinaryFormatter APIs to produce build errors #72132
    7.0.0
  • Assert failure: m_alignpad == 0 in libraries tests #70231
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] update libunwind #72344
    7.0.0
  • normal-microsoft.extensions.configuration.binder.tests work item #72465
    7.0.0
  • LongContinuationChain_Unwrap_DoesNotStackOverflow long running test #68290
  • Error Starting any blazor wasm app in browser with .net 7 preview 5 #72523
  • Add APICompat validation for nullable annotations #41724
    7.0.0
  • Implicit assumption in DI behavior when injecting IServiceProvider into scoped or transient services #63225
    7.0.0
  • HealthCheckService execution leads to a deadlock in the DI stack #70412
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions undoc APIs (more) #58128
    7.0.0
  • CacheExtensions.GetOrCreate{Async} thread-safety #71581
  • How to flush all cache? #36547
    7.0.0
  • `Assembly.GetCallingAssembly` should be marked with `[RequiresDynamicCode]`. #71290
    Future
  • Support async NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection for synchronous pipes #63536
    7.0.0
  • Named pipes hang when written asynchronously w/o async flag #31390
    7.0.0
  • Mobile Networking Tests #54626
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.FileSystem.Net5Compat.Tests failed on Android due to lowmemorykiller #55691
    7.0.0
  • JIT/Regression/VS-ia64-JIT/V2.0-Beta2/b311420/b311420/b311420 times out in jit-cfg runs #71593
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Function.Tests and System.Net.Websockets.Client.Tests work items failing on runtime-extra-platforms Mono_Release runs #72209
    7.0.0
  • JSImportGenerator is introducing analyzer source-build prebuilts #72486
  • System.Text.Json does not correctly handle nested inner types of a generic outer type. #62762
    8.0.0
  • Developers can customize the JSON serialization contracts of their types #63686
    7.0.0
  • Test failure profiler/elt/slowpatheltleave/slowpatheltleave.sh #72420
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/BenchmarksGame/regex-redux/regex-redux-5/regex-redux-5.sh #66625
    7.0.0
  • [Android] Some System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests failing #69870
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Requests.Tests tests fail on Android #37087
    7.0.0
  • Wrong Enter/Leave callbacks for DispatchTailCalls on Linux ARM32 #72333
  • Why read values from object when binding object to configuration-section #36459
    Future
  • [Perf] Regressions in BenchmarksGame.FannkuchRedux_5 #68822
    7.0.0
  • Looping method call in a BackgroundWorker does an access violation instead of a StackOverflowException #68413
    Future
  • Publish error with blazor .7 preview 5 and AOT #71592
    7.0.0
  • X509 certificates can be easily found by target hostname #59870
    7.0.0
  • Add X509SubjectAlternativeName as a rich type #22699
    7.0.0
  • [Android][libraries] System.Runtime.Caching.Tests fails on Android #52652
    7.0.0
  • Consider moving UnsupportedOSPlatform on MD5 from the class to methods #68556
    7.0.0
  • PAL test file_io/GetFullPathNameA/test3/paltest_getfullpathnamea_test3 does not pass #42289
    7.0.0
  • Port rust regex tests #61894
    7.0.0
  • Crossgen2 composite framework build emits OptimizedInboxTextEncoder layout mismatched with the CoreCLR runtime #64419
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `ConfigurationBinderTests.CanBindNonInstantiatedSortedSetWithSomeValues` failing when tests are trimmed #72461
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Can't call a function pointer with a ref return value #72316
  • JIT/opt/ValueNumbering/TypeTestFolding fails on mono LLVM AOT #72460
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Generic attributes handling in CustomAttributeDecoder #72561
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Clarified documentation regarding building the Core_Root. #72560
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix "cns".StartsWith bug #72558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS] Enable System.Data.Common tests #72554
  • Fix flaky PhysicalFileProviderTests #72553
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Enable Diagnostics.Tracing tests #72545
    needs-author-action
  • [NativeAOT] Some cleanup of assembly helpers in hijack area. #72542
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify UpgradeToRegexGenerator #72538
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Avoid empty segments from PipeReader.ReadAsync #72536
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Annotating System.Formats.Asn1 library for Aot #72533
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add missing nullability annotation in CodeDom #72532
    area-System.CodeDom
  • Make RateLimiterOptions follow Options pattern #72530
    area-System.Threading
  • Bump terser from 5.8.0 to 5.14.2 in /src/mono/wasm/runtime #72529
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution, javascript
  • Bump terser from 5.10.0 to 5.14.2 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-webpack #72528
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution, javascript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: speed up VNPairForFunc #72527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix no-unused-but-set-variable warnings #72525
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable NI_Vector256_Create on AVX1 #72522
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Emit warning instead of an error in package compatibility check #72518
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, packaging, 7.0.0
  • [Mono]: Fix infrequent infinite loop on Mono EventPipe streaming thread. #72517
    area-Tracing-mono
  • JIT: Move cpblk GC ref layout check back to lowering #72516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • X86 assert fix #72505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [mono][jit] Fix an infinite loop in the abcrem pass. #72504
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Remove code duplication in TarHeader class #72501
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Add ease of use helpers in X.509 #72500
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Add RefEscapesAttribute #72499
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [NativeAot] Fixing Resources.Reader and ComponentModel tests #72497
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete reachable Debug.Fail in regex generator codefix #72534
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [mono] ThisCall with no arguments is invalid #72495
    area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update DebuggerDisplay for metadata types & JsonSerializerOptions #72524
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix finding attribute data for syntax for assembly/module symbols #72535
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Add missing <returns> documentation to NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm #72541
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Generate SerializeHandler as an instance method #72510
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm] Dev loop incremental build fixups #72502
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1892876 #72508
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix for m_alignpad == 0 assertion failure #72475
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update llvm-libunwind from v9.0.0 to v14.0.6 #72442
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] fix sample typos #72515
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update /// comments for new InteropServices APIs #72473
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fix Configuration Binder Test with WASM and Trimming #72485
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • [iOS] Use different tvOS helix queue for PR's #72467
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable cancellation for anonymous pipes and non-async named pipes on Windows #72503
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Compare symbols instead of fully qualified name #72507
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Mark b311420 test GC Stress incompatible on all platforms #72444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [libs] Add EventSourceSupport to CountersTest #72484
    area-System.Runtime.Caching
  • Remove hard-coded RunAnalyzer property in JSImportGenerator #72487
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Fix pri1 test build #72520
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix an infinite loop in the abcrem pass. #72213
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Ensure metadata originating from converters is surfaced while JsonTypeInfo is mutable. #72483
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Fix some System.Net tests #71385
    area-System.Net
  • Update NuGet reference versions #72451
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adding rust tests for match boundaries #72490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Add X509 SAN extension and RFC6125 MatchesHostname #72304
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Update recursive resource load message #72480
    area-System.Resources
  • Move UnsupportedOSPlatform from class to methods for MD5 and HMACMD5 #72488
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Fix PAL GetFullPathNameA test3 #72492
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add analyzer for validating NativeMarshallingAttribute and parameters of CustomMarshallerAttribute #72299
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Re-enable test that passes locally #72491
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Handle blittable byref returns in built-in marshalling #72433
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Avoid an assert when encoding fnptr classes. #72479
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Updated

  • Support for RequiresAttributeMismatch testing #72496
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Warn on trimming with COM hosting (built-in COM support) enabled #72493
    area-Host
  • Add TranslateKey to PartitionedRateLimiter #69407
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Implement test checking whether CET is active #71509
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add `perf-wasm` pipeline #72119
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] add new interop to the console template #72375
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [RateLimiting] Add statistics API #72306
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm-ep] Implement DiagnosticServer and startup sessions for WebAssembly #72482
    arch-wasm, area-Tracing-mono
  • [RateLimiting] Fix test race with timer #72118
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [Unix] Console.ReadKey rewrite #72193
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Fixing PhysicalFilesWatcher path maintenance (Issue #71386) #72041
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • Make TypeBuilder.CreateType return non nullable #72180
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0][mono] add 400 band workloads #72379
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Improve RegexCharClass.Analyze for sets with subtraction #72328
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Add missing System.Net docs #72459
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-tvos
  • [wasm] improve startup #72275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: teach VN to fold type comparisons #72136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • #53624 enable test suites in maccatalyst #72445
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • HTTP/3 Improved message for failing QUIC connection #72374
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance #70944
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fold `TYP_STRUCT` indirect access to promoted locals #71584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #70668
    area-Serialization
  • Additional tests for Generics in System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration #72449
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Include EventLog.Messages in WindowsDesktop pack #72280
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Introduce NetTraceToMibcConverter task & streamline testing targets #72394
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Log as error in interop generator when method signature is not supported #71477
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix debugger funceval deadlock #72179
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Issue71025 test #72154
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fixes overwrite of last captured managed stack frame address in EvenPipe stack trace. #72362
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix unwind info capturing in Linux coredumps #72417
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.9
  • [wasm] reduce legacy interop usage #72021
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Fixing the per object hard limit support for regions #72229
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Move some CorElementType acquiring to managed #70987
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places #72082
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rename [RegexGenerator] to [Regex] #72434
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Ensure prerequisites are installed on the perf pipeline #72431
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
